title: What Is Lowering FPS in Recent Patches (on low spec machines)
body:
I play on a complete toaster, I'm not trying to defend my PC at all.

I stopped playing for a few weeks while the Bilgewater event was on, because I only play ARAM and the Butchers Bridge map dropped my fps to about 1/5 of what it was on Howling Abyss.
Since it reverted to Howling Abyss, I'm around half the FPS I used to be before that event.
The game is borderline unplayable for me since then, and the only change is LoL patches.

I guess I just need to quit LoL and retro-game until I get a new PC?
I still managed a few S grades @ 15fps, but it's not a good gaming experience, hence why I only login every 3-4 days now.
